TopicTitle: My Mun is a reskin of Kerbin, have no idea why.

Articles.Content: So, playing on my Sandbox save after deorbiting a Mun satellite, I went into EVA view to see a very recognizable crater from Kerbin. I saw a river and some mountains near the poles, all where they should be. The only planet-editing mod I have is Outer Planets Mod, But I can provide a mod list if needed. Anyone know what might be causing this? Also, it still has Mun topography, like it's craters. Sadly, I have no idea if this kind of stuff is stored in the logs or even if it's able to be reproduced. Thanks for reading.
Thanks. I don't really read mod download threads, so I usually have no clue if an issue I have is one everyone else who has that mod has.
